title: A Young Singer's Sad Story with a Snake Bite
summary: A young singer from Nigeria named Ifunanya Nwangene, who was 26 years old, died after a snake bit her in her home in Abuja. She was famous for being on a TV singing show called The Voice Nigeria and sang many types of music like jazz and soul. Friends said she was sleeping when the snake woke her up, and two snakes were found in her house. She went to a clinic first, but they did not have the medicine she needed, so she went to a hospital. The hospital tried to help her with medicine and care, but she could not breathe well and passed away. Her friends and choir members were very sad and hoped for a miracle. The hospital said they did their best to save her.

when a snake uses its teeth to hurt someone, which can be dangerous
a place where doctors and nurses help sick or hurt people

background_read: This story is about a real event in Nigeria, a country in Africa. Sometimes, snakes can be found in homes, and their bites can be very harmful. Hospitals have special medicines called antivenom to treat snake bites, but not all places have them. It is important to be careful around snakes and seek help quickly if someone gets bitten. This article shows how a community comes together when something sad happens.
Article_Structure: WHO: Ifunanya Nwangene, a 26-year-old singer from Nigeria
WHAT: She died after being bitten by a snake in her home
WHERE: In Abuja, the capital city of Nigeria
WHY: Because the snake bite caused severe problems, and despite hospital efforts, she could not survive

perspectives.description: Friends are sad and remember her as a talented singer who had big plans.
